article.title: Iron Bow Supports Network Enterprise Center
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Iron Bow Technologies Limited Liability Company, Chantilly, Virginia, was awarded a $7,098,269 firm-fixed-price contract for the lifetime replacement initiative for the Network Enterprise Center at Fort Sam Houston, Texas. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Rock Island, Illinois, is the contracting activity.
